Author: FFXIVMate
Name: Macro Mate
Punchline: Organise your macros with Macro Mate
Description:
Store as many macros as you want. Link macros to vanilla macro slots for easy controller support.

This plugin does NOT extend the macro system in any way, macro execution is still limited to 15 lines and this plugin provides no extra commands.

Longer macros can be stored in MacroMate, but macros can only be executed and linked in 15-line blocks.
